entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
